mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `pause_feature` (OPERATOR_ID, FINISHER_ID, REASON, ALARM_MESSSAGE_ID, MATERIAL_ID, SECTION_ID, POSITION_ID, COMMENTS, PAUSE_START_TIME, PAUSE_FINISH_TIME, snout_serial_no) VALUES (#{operator_id}, #{finisher_id}, #{reason}, #{alarm_messsage_id}, #{material_id}, #{section_id}, #{position_id}, #{comments}, current_timestamp, #{pause_finish_time}, #{snout_serial_no} );
mapper.update: UPDATE `pause_feature` SET FINISHER_ID = #{operator_id}, PAUSE_FINISH_TIME = current_timestamp WHERE OPERATOR_ID = #{operator_id} AND (PAUSE_FINISH_TIME IS NULL OR PAUSE_FINISH_TIME > current_timestamp) AND (REASON BETWEEN 100 and 300 OR REASON BETWEEN 49 and 70) ;
mapper.select: SELECT operator_id, pause_start_time, reason FROM `pause_feature` WHERE OPERATOR_ID = #{operator_id} AND (PAUSE_FINISH_TIME IS NULL OR PAUSE_FINISH_TIME > current_timestamp) AND (REASON BETWEEN 100 and 300 OR REASON BETWEEN 49 and 70) order by pause_start_time desc limit 1 ;
